short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cutting-edge slither.io MOD for playing more comfortably.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Frontier Slither is a slither.io MOD that makes more fun to play.
Anyone, from beginners to professional players, can play.

----------------------------------------------------------

Main features:

* Party - You can always create a group to play with your friends.
* Improved Championship Edition (Circle Bot available)
* Real-time leaderboards and optimized server lists.
* Auto coiling - Disable the mouse move and automatically Coiling. If you want to stay small on the spot temporarily, this is recommended instead of Bot.
* Build Slither Plus - A tool that allows you to create and edit custom skins more conveniently.
* Zoom Smoothing - You can smoothly change the field of view size when zooming.
* Various graphic settings for improved FPS and visibility. For example, you can disable the effects of snake acceleration and death.
* Mini-map and Leaderboard resizing.
* Kills counter.
* Server ping measurement.
* Border assist.
* Playtime display.
* Cosmetic support.
* Custom tags.
* Save multiple custom skins.
* Language switching feature (English and Japanese are supported).

----------------------------------------------------------
v6.1.0
- Updated the UI on the main screen.
- Added a character count indicator to the nickname input field.
- Made significant changes to the server selection UI:
  - Revamped the design of the server selection window.
  - Added four new configuration options related to server selection.
- Enabled connections to servers using IPv6 addresses.
- Server IDs are now displayed during gameplay.
- Party functionality now supports server IDs and IPv6.
- Added warnings for older browser versions in preparation for raising the minimum supported version.
- Changed the URL for the server list retrieval API.
- Updated the URL for the real-time leaderboard.
- Made minor UI adjustments.
- Fixed several bugs.

v6.0.10
- Removed button to the enter code page. 
- Added a new public tag for NTL.

v6.0.8
-  Minimap now also supports dynamic borders.

v6.0.7
- New dynamic border is supported. (However, at this time the minimap does not support dynamic borders. The minimap will display the border czar shadow)
- Fixed bot and border assist features along with dynamic border support.
- Borders are no longer displayed when zooming out when far from the border.
- Mouse angle and boost sending interval adjusted.

v6.0.5
- Fixed a bug that when re-creating a custom skin for a pattern that already existed, that skin was not selected.
- Fixed a bug that caused inoperability if the exit operation was performed during a fade.

v6.0.3
- Fixed minor bugs.

v6.0.0
- The overall design has been revamped.
- The setting option "Show the glow when the snake is accelerating" now allows you to choose from three options: None, All, and Own.
  - None: Acceleration effects will not be displayed. This is the default setting.
  - All: Acceleration effects will be displayed.
  - Own: Acceleration effects will be displayed only for yourself, and the acceleration effects of other players will not be shown.
- Added a new setting option "Invert mouse wheel zoom" .
- The setting option "Allow the header text color to be changed" has been removed.
- Several settings related to the clock have been removed.
  - Removed items: "Date", "Week", "Time", "Separator", "Hour notation", "Month notation", and "Custom format".
  - The clock format will now automatically change based on the locale.
- The new official protocol (protocol version 15) is now supported.
  - The tail part rendering has been improved to match the official version.
- The minimum supported browser version has been raised to 104.
- Various other bug fixes and performance improvements have been implemented.
